title: Will the Red Bull Recipe Work in Professional Cycling? Here’s How the New Owners Will Mix Things Up.
content:
Taking careful stock of Red Bull's blockbuster acquisition of Bora-Hansgrohe and its implications on cycling in the near future.

Read the full article at Will the Red Bull Recipe Work in Professional Cycling? Here’s How the New Owners Will Mix Things Up. on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
